info.title: MyRide
info.description: This document describes the MyRide API, built with Laravel (PHP), MySQL as the primary database, and Firebase for cloud storage and NoSQL data storage.

post.description: This authentication request is used to access the application and obtain an authorization token for accessing all protected APIs. This request interacts with the MySQL database.

401.description: account is not found or have wrong password

post.description: This authentication request is used to get token validation after register. This request interacts with the MySQL database and using mailer.

200.description: the validation token has been sended to {email} email account

message.example: the validation token has been sended to flazen.edu@gmail.com email account

409.description: there already a request with same username / username has been used. try another

message.example: there already a request with same username

post.description: This authentication request is used to get token validation after register. This request interacts with the MySQL database and using mailer.

message.example: username has been used. try another

post.description: This authentication request is used to regenerate a token after user has failed to validate their previous token. This request interacts with the MySQL database and using mailer.

200.description: the validation token has been sended to {email} email account

message.example: the validation token has been sended to flazen.edu@gmail.com email account
the validation token has been sended to flazen.edu@gmail.com email account

post.description: This authentication request is used to sign out from application or reset current session. This request interacts with the MySQL database.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This NLP request is used to do analyze and find data using command (prompt). This request interacts with the MySQL database.

question.example: can you find my vehicle with the most trip?

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a dictionary entry based on the provided `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and have a protected routes.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This request is used to created a dictionary by using given `dictionary_type`, and `dictionary_name`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and have a protected routes.

message.example: dictionary name must be at least 2 characters
dictionary type must be one of the following values trip_category, vehicle_merk, vehicle_type, vehicle_category, vehicle_status, vehicle_default_fuel, vehicle_fuel_status, vehicle_transmission
dictionary name has been used. try another

get.description: This request is used to get dictionary by its `dictionary_type`, that can be trip_category, vehicle_merk, vehicle_type, vehicle_category, vehicle_status, vehicle_default_fuel, vehicle_fuel_status, or vehicle_transmission. This request interacts with the MySQL database and can be accessed as public routes or protected routes. When accessed with a token (protected routes), the returned list includes both public and private dictionaries. When accessed without a token, only public dictionaries are returned.

200.description: Dictionary fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `dictionary_type` and `dictionary_name`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a driver entry based on the provided `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.summary: Hard Delete Driver Relation With Vehicle By ID
delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a driver relation with vehicle entry based on the provided driver relation `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

404.description: driver relation failed to permentally deleted

get.description: This request is used to get all driver. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and a pagination.

200.description: Driver fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `created_at`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This request is used to create a driver by using given `username`, `fullname`, `password`, `telegram_user_id`, `email`, `phone`, and `notes`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to get all driver with his assigned vehicle. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and a pagination.

200.description: Driver fetched successfully. Ordered in descending order by driver relation's `created_at`

vehicle_list.example: D 1610 ZBC - Brio RS MT, D 4110 ADC - Toyota Innova

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

post.description: This request is used to create a driver - vehicle relation by using given `vehicle_id`, `driver_id`, and `relation_note`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, broadcast message with Telegram, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to get all driver name. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

200.description: Driver fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `fullname`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.summary: Get All Driver - Vehicle Relation For Management / Assigning
get.description: This request is used to get all driver with their assigned vehicle for management / assigning. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

401.description: Protected route  requires sign-in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login
something went wrong. please contact admin

delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete an error history based on the provided `ID`. However, it will also search for all errors with the same `message` and delete them. This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes (Admin only).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to get all error audit. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes (Admin only), and a pagination.

200.description: Error fetched successfully. Ordered in ascending order by `created_at`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

get.description: This request is used to export all wash data (dataset). To test it, you must execute the request in a web browser to download the file. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, exported file, and broadcast message with Telegram.

200.description: Export wash successfully. File downloaded as `xlsx` format and ordered in descending order by `created_at`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, broadcast message with Telegram, and audited activity (history).

200.description: telegram id updated! and validation has been sended to you

put.description: This request is used to validate user's `telegram_user_id` changing request by using given `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, broadcast message with Telegram, and audited activity (history).

This request is used to update user profile. The updated field are `email`, `username`, and `telegram_user_id`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, broadcast message with Telegram, and audited activity (history).

message.example: username or email has been used. try another

200.description: User fetched successfully. Ordered in descending order by `created_at`

get.description: This request is used to get list of year in which the user has created content (Vehicle, Trip, Service, and Wash History). This request interacts with the MySQL database, and has a protected routes.

200.description: User year fetched successfully. Ordered in descending order by `year`

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

put.description: This request is used to update a vehicle by using given `ID`. The updated fields are `vehicle_name`, `vehicle_merk`, `vehicle_type`, `vehicle_price`, `vehicle_distance`, `vehicle_category`, `vehicle_status`, `vehicle_year_made`, `vehicle_plate_number`, `vehicle_fuel_status`, `vehicle_default_fuel`, `vehicle_color`, `vehicle_transmission`, and `vehicle_capacity`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

message.example: vehicle name must be at least 2 characters
vehicle type is a required field
vehicle type must be one of the following values City Car, Minibus, Motorcycle, Hatchback, Sedan, SUV, Pickup Truck, Convertible, Coupe, Van, Wagon, Crossover, Electric

post.summary: Post Update Vehicle Image By ID
post.description: This request is used to update vehicle image by given vehicle's `ID`. And the updated field is `vehicle_img_url`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, firebase storage, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

message.example: vehicle image is a required field

post.summary: Post Update Vehicle Image Collection By Id
post.description: This request is used to update vehicle image collection by given vehicle's `ID`. The updated field is `vehicle_other_img_url`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, firebase storage, and has a protected routes.

message.example: vehicle image collection is a required field

delete.summary: Delete Vehicle Image Collection By Image ID
delete.description: This request is used to delete an image in vehicle by given `vehicle_id` and `image_id` for the image collection. Updated field is `vehicle_other_img_url`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, firebase storage, and has a protected routes.

message.example: vehicle image collection is a required field

post.description: This request is used to create a new vehicle using `vehicle_name`, `vehicle_merk`, `vehicle_type`, `vehicle_price`, `vehicle_distance`, `vehicle_category`, `vehicle_status`, `vehicle_year_made`, `vehicle_plate_number`, `vehicle_fuel_status`, `vehicle_default_fuel`, `vehicle_color`, `vehicle_transmission`, `vehicle_capacity`, `vehicle_img_url`, and `vehicle_other_img_url`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, firebase storage (for vehicle_image and vehicle_other_img), broadcast using Telegram, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

message.example: vehicle name must be at least 2 characters
vehicle type is a required field
vehicle type must be one of the following values City Car, Minibus, Motorcycle, Hatchback, Sedan, SUV, Pickup Truck, Convertible, Coupe, Van, Wagon, Crossover, Electric

post.summary: Post Update Vehicle Document By ID
post.description: This request is used to update vehicle document by given vehicle's `ID`. The updated field is `vehicle_document`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, firebase storage, and has a protected routes.

message.example: The file size must be under 10 mb

delete.description: This request is used to delete a vehicle based on the provided `ID`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, broadcast message with Telegram, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

delete.summary: Hard Delete Vehicle Document By ID
delete.description: This request is used to permanently delete a vehicle document based on the provided `vehicle_id` and `doc_id`. This request interacts with the MySQL database, firebase storage, and has a protected routes.

401.description: protected route need to include sign in token as authorization bearer

message.example: you need to include the authorization token from login

This request interacts with the MySQL database, has a protected routes, and audited activity (history).

telegram_user_id.description: Telegram Account ID for Bot Apps

email.description: Email for Auth and Task Scheduling

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the admin was updated

id.description: Primary key for the chat history record

answer.description: System generated answer based on fetch result

is_success.description: Indicates whether the question were understandable

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the chat history record

dictionary_type.description: Type or group of the dictionary

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the dictionary

telegram_user_id.description: Telegram user ID associated with the driver

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the driver was last updated

id.description: Primary key for the driver-vehicle relation

relation_note.description: Additional note describing the driver-vehicle relation

created_at.description: Timestamp when the relation was created

message.description: Message or description of the error

stack_trace.description: Trail of function calls leading up to the error

file.description: Path of the file where the error is faced

line.description: Line of code in specific file where the error is faced

created_at.description: Timestamp when the error was faced

faced_by.description: ID of the user who specific faced the error

is_show.description: Indicates whether the FAQ is visible to users

created_at.description: Timestamp when the FAQ was created

type.description: Type of the failed jobs on Task Scheduling

status.description: Status of the failed jobs on Task Scheduling

created_at.description: Timestamp when the jobs had failed

id.description: Primary key of the fuel record

fuel_price_total.description: Total price paid for the fuel

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the fuel record was last updated

access_token.description: Access token of Google Sign In

id.description: Primary key of the inventory record

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was last updated

reminder_context.description: Context or category of the reminder

reminder_attachment.description: Optional attachment data for the reminder. This is an array of objects containing two keys: attachment_type (image or location) and attachment_value (an uploaded image URL or a location coordinate)

remind_at.description: Timestamp when the reminder should be triggered

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the reminder

id.description: Primary key for the service record

service_note.description: Additional notes or details about the service

service_location.description: Location where the service was performed

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the service record was last updated

remind_at.description: Optional reminder timestamp for the service

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the service record

vehicle_id.description: ID of the vehicle used for the trip

driver_id.description: ID of the driver assigned to the trip

trip_desc.description: Description or purpose of the trip

trip_category.description: Category of the trip, referenced from dictionary

trip_person.description: Person or passenger related to the trip

trip_origin_name.description: Name of the trip origin location

trip_origin_coordinate.description: Coordinate of the trip origin location

trip_destination_name.description: Name of the trip destination location

trip_destination_coordinate.description: Coordinate of the trip destination location

created_at.description: Timestamp when the trip was created

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the trip

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the trip was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the trip was soft deleted

telegram_is_valid.description: Validation status of attached telegram account

email.description: Email for Auth and Task Scheduling

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the user was updated

created_by.description: ID of the user who make the request

vehicle_merk.description: Brand or manufacturer of the vehicle

vehicle_type.description: Type of the vehicle, referenced from dictionary

vehicle_distance.description: Total distance traveled by the vehicle

vehicle_category.description: Category of the vehicle, referenced from dictionary

vehicle_status.description: Current status of the vehicle, referenced from dictionary

vehicle_fuel_status.description: Fuel status of the vehicle, referenced from dictionary

vehicle_fuel_capacity.description: Fuel tank capacity of the vehicle

vehicle_default_fuel.description: Default fuel type for the vehicle, referenced from dictionary

vehicle_transmission.description: Transmission type of the vehicle, referenced from dictionary

vehicle_img_url.description: Main image URL of the vehicle

vehicle_other_img_url.description: Additional image URLs of the vehicle

vehicle_document.description: Additional documents related to the vehicle

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the vehicle

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the vehicle was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the vehicle was soft deleted

id.description: Primary key for the wash record

wash_desc.description: Additional description or notes for the wash

wash_by.description: Person or service that performed the wash

is_wash_body.description: Indicates whether the vehicle body was washed

is_wash_window.description: Indicates whether the vehicle windows were washed

is_wash_dashboard.description: Indicates whether the dashboard was cleaned

is_wash_tires.description: Indicates whether the tires were cleaned

is_wash_trash.description: Indicates whether trash inside the vehicle was removed

is_wash_engine.description: Indicates whether the engine area was cleaned

is_wash_seat.description: Indicates whether the seats were cleaned

is_wash_carpet.description: Indicates whether the carpet was cleaned

is_wash_pillows.description: Indicates whether pillows or cushions were cleaned

wash_address.description: Address where the wash was performed

wash_start_time.description: Start time of the washing process

wash_end_time.description: End time of the washing process

is_fill_window_washing_water.description: Indicates whether window washing water was refilled

is_wash_hollow.description: Indicates whether vehicle hollows or gaps were cleaned

wash_price.description: Total cost of the washing service

created_at.description: Timestamp when the wash record was created

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the wash record

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the wash record was last updated

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme
